comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
I like the composition of this picture, as many of the 'Phillips" collection.  Whoever took these pictures had a very artistic eye.  I do not think this is a "rowing boat" -  there are no rowlocks and it looks too heavy and substantial, unlike the lighter vessel behind.

An educated guess - that looks like Millers Point in the left distant background; so this could be at Blues Point or Lavender Bay ?

comment.author: 50385915@N00
comment._content: Yeah, it's more of a drift boat. It's got that funny keel...

comment.author: 92655677@N00
comment._content: I also got caught by the composition. The boat's listing to the side draws your eye in and across to the distant Bay. Nice photo...

comment.author: 22929657@N00
comment._content: Could this be the same photographer? www.flickr.com/photos/murfomurf/1238188705/

comment._content:
Were this published today, I'd not be surprised if it got to Explore.......  :-))
Splendid composition.
